name: EpicShop
description:
Preview V1.7 has been released!

Check out the devlog or read about previous updates here

Hectic CO-OP Shopkeeping "Welcome back, heroes!"

What does two retired heroes do after saving the world? They start a store for aspiring adventurers, of course!

It is your task to appease the customers' wishes by gathering necessary resources and creating the finest wares. But hurry - the customers are not patient...

Controls

This game is designed to be played by two people locally on either a keyboard or two controllers (recommended).

Go grab a mate - EpicShop is a two player game, requiring two players for the fun to begin!

Follow our development

EpicShop is being developed by the Wacky Wizards - a group of 6 passionate game developers!

This page shows our free preview versions of EpicShop but we have plans to publish a full, paid version of the game on Steam and XBox! Feedback through itch.io is greatly appreciated to accomplish this goal.

If you want to follow the EpicShop development, consider leaving feedback here on Itch or on our sites:
Visit our website, follow us on Twitter, like us on Facebook and join our Discord server to get announcements and interact directly with the developers!
